fno: In the cash market, the Nifty 50 added 83.45 points or 0.43% to settle at 19,393.60. The NSE's India VIX, a gauge of market's expectation of volatility over the near term, fell 1.50% to 11.96. Reliance Industries (RIL), HDFC Bank and Adani Ports and Special Economic Zone were the top traded individual stock futures contracts in F&O segment of NSE. The August 2023 F&O contracts will expire on 31 August 2023.
